name: cudacluster
short_description: The CUDA Cluster allows you to organize a cluster of CUDA-enabled Peer-To-Peer nodes, allowing for execution of tasks with extreme performance, by harnessing the combined power of multiple such GPU hosts. Sample jobs are provided. C#.Net/Mono with C.
